about.title: About Me
about.name: Russidan Nadee
about.description: A passionate fresh graduate from Silpakorn University with expertise in cross-platform development. I specialize in creating efficient, user-friendly applications using modern technologies like Flutter, TypeScript, and Node.js. Always eager to learn and grow, I'm ready to contribute to innovative projects and bring creative solutions to life.
